column5: I live in Manitoba and am looking at buying a new boat what is a good price for this Lund boat, motor and trailer. I have the option of buying the boat and trailer, seperate and then buying the motor from another retailer. Or all together as a pkg deal. What should i be paying for these (fair prices at this time of year), of course i want a good deal. Lund 1675 explorer =$ 50 hp honda (gas assit or power)=$ Galvinized trailer =$
